mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECYCLE_BOARD WHERE STATUS='Y'

SELECT BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, COUNT, RECY_BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE
FROM RECYCLE_BOARD WHERE STATUS='Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE RECYCLE_BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{rbno} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT R.BOARD_NO , R.RECY_BOARD_TITLE , R.RECY_BOARD_CONTENT , R.COUNT , R.CREATE_DATE , B.BO_ORIGIN_NAME FROM RECYCLE_BOARD R LEFT JOIN BOARD_ATTACHMENT B ON R.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO WHERE R.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND R.STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.delete: UPDATE RECYCLE_BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = #{rbno}
UPDATE BOARD_ATTACHMENT SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*,ROWNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM RECYCLE_BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY COUNT DESC) A WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
